entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming south 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy. A few showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
